response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and significance to both of us, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can purchase the product for $14,500. This exclusive deal is designed to ensure you benefit from a substantial discount while securing this exceptional item at a highly favorable price. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for us to collaborate and achieve mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
